Bonus4Desc: (4) Whenever you gain or use a Furious Power ability charge while in combat, your damage is increased by 10% for 10 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Dealing damage has a 10% chance to build a Furious Power ability charge. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Enemies affected by Intimidating Roar have greatly reduced accuracy for 6 seconds after Intimidating Roar wears off.
(4) Force Charge gets two charges.
(4) Vicious Slash and Massacre deal 5% more damage.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Vicious Slash, Massacre and Sweeping Slash add Vicious Thirst stacks to their targets, stacking up to 5 times. Killing an enemy with Vicious Thirst stacks increases your damage by 3% per stack for 10 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Activating Dual Saber Throw grants Dispatcher's Challenge, making your next Vicious Throw critically hit. This effect cann't occur more than once every minute.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Using Dual Saber Throw with Rabid Furor active grants Dispatcher, finishing the cooldown of Force Charge and making your next Vicious Throw usable on any target.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Mad Dash's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Activating Mad Dash while under Force Camouflage makes it critically hit and slows any targets it damages.

Bonus4Desc: (4) After executing Mad Dash, you gain 20% damage reduction for 6 seconds.
(4) After Force Choke stun effect finishes, it slows its target and every target nearby it for 6 seconds.
(4) Retaliation has no cooldown.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Taking damage during Endure Pain grants Retaliator stacks, increasing the damage of your next Retaliation by 10% per stack.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Reduces the cooldown of Threatening Scream by 5 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Threatening Scream increases your damage reduction by 2.5% for each enemy it hits. This effect lasts 10 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Killing the enemy affected by Whirlwind before its cooldown ends resets the cooldown of Whirlwind.
(4) Force Slow now has 2 charges. Using Force Slow on an enemy already under the effect of Force Slow slows them by an additional 20% and extends the duration.
(4) Overload increases your defense by 5% for 10 seconds. Getting attacked during this time causes your next Force attack to critically hit. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds.
(4) Electrocute's stun lasts an additional 2 seconds.
(4) Dark Heal's critical chance is increased by 10%.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Dark Heal heals for 20% if you have a Consuming Darkness or Reverse Corruption stack and consumes 1 stack upon use.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Volt Rush deals 10% more damage.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Energize now stack up to 3 times. Force Speed immediately recharges two Volt Rush ability charges.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Force Speed makes your next Force attack deal 20% more damage and Force attacks deal 20% more damage while Polarity Shift is active.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Activating Force Speed reduces the cooldown of Polarity Shift by 10 seconds. Using Polarity Shift immediately after adds 10 seconds to its duration.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Reduces the cooldown of Innervate by 1.5 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Healing a target with another ability while Resurgence is active on them has a chance to cause an extra Resurgence tick for half. Refreshing Resurgence on a target refunds some force.

Bonus4Desc: (4) The cooldown of Recklessness is reduced by 15 seconds. Whenever you consume a charge of Recklessness you gain a stack of Reckless Critical, making your next Assassinate or Maul critically hit. Stacks up to 3 times.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Whenever you consume a charge of Recklessness you gain a stack of Reckless Slaughter, increasing melee damage done by 10% for 30 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Spike's stun and slow effects last for an additional second.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Using Spike grants you a 10% damage reduction for 6 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Overcharge Saber and Force Cloak reset the cooldown of Phantom Stride
Bonus6Desc: (6) Using Phantom Stride from stealth grants Shadowcraft, increasing your critical hit chance by 100% for 6 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Each target hit by Severing Slash grants 1% Damage Reduction for 10 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Each target hit by Severing Slash extends Deflection's duration by 1 second.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Reduces the cooldown of Overcharge Saber by 20 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Killing an enemy during Overcharge Saber refreshes the duration of Overcharge Saber. Can occur up to 5 times during one Overcharge Saber.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Severing Slash immobilizes the target for 2 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Using Severing Slash while under Force Shroud lowers the target accuracy and extends the duration of Force Shroud by 2 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) When your Kolto Counter's Health Monitor is triggered for the first time, it deals damage back to the enemy who damaged you.
(4) Stealth Scan also applies Stealth Protection to you, scanning a small area around you.
(4) Whenever you take damage with Energy Shield, a weaker shield is applied to nearby targets for 3 seconds.
(4) Thermal Sensor Override gains 2 charges.
(4) Activating Power Shot, Tracer Missile or Rapid Scan increases the critical chance of your next Power Shot, Tracer Missile or Rapid Scan by 3%. Stacks up to 5 times but is removed on 6th stack.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Dealing damage with Power Shot or Tracer Missile and healing with Rapid Scan grant a stack of Power Step, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, your next Power Shot, Tracer Missile or Rapid Scan is more effective and costs no Heat.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Gaining a stack of Supercharge increases your critical chance by 10% for 10 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Doing damage or healing an ally has a 5% chance to build a Supercharge, and can only happen once every 3 seconds. After activating Supercharged Gas, your next Rail Shot or Mag Shot critically hits.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Power Surge grants Precision Targeting, increases armor penetration by 10% for 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once a minute.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Power Surge gets an additional charge.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Onboard AED becomes an instant cast.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Chaff Flare heals all allies around you.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Flaming Fist and Rocket Punch's heat cost is reduced by 4. Flaming Fist and Magnetic Blast increase damage dealt by 10% for 15 seconds, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Activating Energy Shield gives you Firefall for the duration of Energy Shield. During this time, dealing damage with Searing Wave, Flame Burst, Magnetic Blast, Rocket Punch, or Flaming Fist builds up to 7 stacks of Firefall. When Energy Shield ends, it detonates dealing elemental damage to all enemies that scales with Firefall stacks. After it explodes, your heat-using abilities cost 50% less heat for 20 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Explosive Fuel increases damage done by 20% while Ion Gas Cylinder is being utilized and increases damage reduction by 10% while Ion Gas Cylinder is not being utilized.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Each time you take damage while under Power Yield, the cooldown of Explosive Fuel is reduced by 3 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Carbonize's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Carbonize vents 5 heat for each enemy it hits.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Searing Wave makes all targets vulnerable to Shoulder Cannon 5 seconds. While Shoulder Cannon loads missiles, you restore 2 heat per second.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Each Shoulder Cannon rocket has a 75% chance to trigger an additional rocket.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Flash Bang now heals any allies nearby for a small amount and resets the cooldown of Countermeasures.
(4) Shield Probe creates a small shield around surrounding allies.
(4) Any enemy who attacks you during Adrenaline Probe is stunned for 2 seconds.
(4) Frag Grenade slows its primary target and all targets around it by 30% for 6 seconds.
(4) Toxic Haze refunds all its energy.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Toxic Haze heals any allies standing inside it by a minor amount.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Toxic Haze refunds a Tactical Advantage.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Activating Noxious Knives reduces the cooldown of Toxic Haze by 3 seconds. Every enemy affected by Toxic Haze takes 20% more damage from Noxious Knives.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Exfiltrate's recharge time is reduced by 2 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Debilitate gets two additional charges.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Tactical Overdrive resets the cooldown of backstab, Sever Tendon and Toxic Scan.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Tactical Advantage gets an additional stack. Having a Tactical Advantage increases your damage and healing by 3%.

Bonus4Desc: (4) The cooldown of Entrench is reduced by 10 seconds. You gain 2 energy per second while Entrench is active.
Bonus6Desc: (6) While Entrenched, you gain stacks of Entrenched Offense, increasing damage by 3% per stack while you remain Entrenched. Stacks up to 5 times. Breaking cover or Entrench being removed removes this.

Bonus4Desc: (4) The energy cost of Takedown is reduced by 3.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Killing an enemy within 3 seconds of damaging them with Takedown resets the cooldown of Takedown and gives you a 5% damage buff. This stacks up to 3 times and lasts 10 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Reduces the cooldown of Target Acquired by 15 seconds, and activating Target Acquired restores 15 energy.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Laze Target gets 3 charges and its cooldown reduced by 15 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Reduces the cooldown of Cover Pulse by 5 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Evasion finishes the cooldown of Covered Escape and increases you and your allies' movement speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases your damage dealt by 3% while you guard another player.

Bonus2Desc: (2) Increases Critical Rating by 3% while health is below 50%.
Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases Critical Rating by 5% while health is below 50%.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Increases Critical Rating by 10% while health is below 50%.

Bonus2Desc: (2) Increases Defense by 112 while health is below 50%.
Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases Defense by 230 while health is below 50%.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Increases Defense by 10% while health is below 50%.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases damage dealt by 3%. Increases damage taken by 6%.
(4) Passively regenerates 1% of maximum health every 10 seconds.

Bonus2Desc: (2) Increases Alacrity by 3% while health is below 50%.
Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases Alacrity by 5% while health is below 50%.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Increases Alacrity by 10% while health is below 50%.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Increases damage by 3% while not moving. Increases armor by 10% when moving.
(4) Increases Mastery by 100 while under the effects of a stimpack.
(4) Significantly increases the attack and activation speed of your Companion.
(4) Entering combat improves nearby allies, increasing their Mastery, Endurance, and rate of Experience Point gain. This effect is removed when combat ends.
(4) Defeating an enemy heals you for 20% of your maximum health. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.
Bonus6Desc: (6) Defeating an enemy increases your movement speed by 75% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.

Bonus4Desc: (4) Shielding an attack causes your generator to overdrive. Deals 0 weapon damage to up to 8 enemies within 2 meters.
